attributes.action: give the words 'school' 'college' and 'academy' the same protected status as the word 'university'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A body cannot call itself a university without special permission, however there are hundreds of companies calling themselves schools, colleges or academies, some of which have been prosecuted for false trade descriptions and many of which  have been de-listed by the DeFS and Home Office for having no resources or academic credentials.
